properties.name: OPENVIDU_URL
properties.description: The URL where the OpenVidu server is deployed

properties.name: OPENVIDU_SECRET
properties.description: The OpenVidu secret for the server

properties.name: INITIAL_DATA_FILE
properties.description: The json file where the initial data for the database is taken from

properties.name: OPENVIDU_RECORDING_PATH
properties.description: The local absolute path where OpenVidu recordings are stored

properties.name: OPENVIDU_RECORDING_CUSTOM
properties.description: Whether or not the custom layout for recording is enabled
